Sentencas: Exergy and greenhouse gas emission analyses are performed for a novel trigeneration system driven by a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Greenhouse gas emission and exergy analyses of an integrated trigeneration system driven by a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The trigeneration system also consists of a generator-absorber heat exchanger (GAX) absorption refrigeration system and a heat exchanger to produce electrical energy, cooling and heating, respectively.
Titulo: Greenhouse gas emission and exergy analyses of an integrated trigeneration system driven by a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Four operating cases are considered: electrical power generation, electrical power and cooling cogeneration, electrical power and heating cogeneration, and trigeneration.
Titulo: Greenhouse gas emission and exergy analyses of an integrated trigeneration system driven by a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Attention is paid to numerous system and environmental performance parameters, namely, exergy efficiency, exergy destruction rate, and greenhouse gas emissions.
Titulo: Greenhouse gas emission and exergy analyses of an integrated trigeneration system driven by a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: A maximum enhancement of 46% is achieved in the exergy efficiency when the SOFC is used as the primary mover for the trigeneration system compared to the case when the SOFC is used as a standalone unit.
Titulo: Greenhouse gas emission and exergy analyses of an integrated trigeneration system driven by a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The main sources of irreversibility are observed to be the air heat exchanger, the SOFC and the afterburner.
Titulo: Greenhouse gas emission and exergy analyses of an integrated trigeneration system driven by a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The unit CO2 emission (in kg/MWh) is considerably higher for the case in which only electrical power is generated.
Titulo: Greenhouse gas emission and exergy analyses of an integrated trigeneration system driven by a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This parameter is reduced by half when the system is operates in a trigeneration mode.
Titulo: Greenhouse gas emission and exergy analyses of an integrated trigeneration system driven by a solid oxide fuel cell
